response.original_title: My Catholic Family - St. Elizabeth of Hungary
response.overview: In this animated EWTN Home Video series, children meet a new saint in each episode, and learn about growing in holiness. St. Elizabeth of Hungary always trusted in God's divine direction and providence, throughout good times and bad. As Alex and Sergio participate in a parish competition and use a compass to uncover different clues, they learn that Jesus is our heavenly compass, and that we should always trust in Him.
response.title: My Catholic Family - St. Elizabeth of Hungary
